Html: Hi, i'm developing small ASP.NET app. I wat to get documents from users as docx fileas and convert them to html. I'm using converter inside app, and i'm unable to get images. they are not copied into images folder. Using procmon i realized that this problem is causeb by lack of xcopy command runned at the end of conversion. I alreadd add network service account to administrators group, but it not help. Any idea how to solve that?
